Title: Security update for Linux Kernel Live Patch 18 for SLE 12

Notes.Text: Security update for Linux Kernel Live Patch 18 for SLE 12
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 3.12.60-52_63 fixes several issues.

The following security bugs were fixed:

- CVE-2017-1000364: An issue was discovered in the size of the stack guard page on Linux, specifically a 4k stack guard page is not sufficiently large and can be 'jumped' over (the stack guard page is bypassed) (bsc#1039496).
